about_the_game:
WitchGhost is an exploration adventure game where you play as Ezme, a mischievous witch with a knack for getting into (and out of) trouble. Delve into a spooky yet whimsical world filled with eerie enemies, tricky traps and hidden secrets. As Ezme, you'll explore haunted landscapes, dodging dangers while piecing together your lost memories to find your way back home. With a blend of spooky atmosphere and lighthearted humour, WitchGhost offers a thrilling journey that's as enchanting as it is entertaining.


Explore a spooky yet enchanting world brimming with playful surprises.


Gather Ezme's forgotten memories to restore colour to the world and, naturally, find your way back home.


Master a variety of spells, but beware - they might just as easily work against you as they do for you.


The forest is trecherous. Rely on your wits and quick reflexes to survive.
